amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prohibit funds from being transferred from programs supporting veteran homelessness services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Peters.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
